content: 1dc fasten using oddments of black & white yarns off 70sts & 35ch loops do not leave long tail make either a magic magic_ring or a 3ch slip_stitch *from now on continue mane into first chain ring work in rounds with rs facing by working in rounds * black 9dc do not slip_stitch in top of next st rounds 8 & 9 rejoin yarn to 1st front loop of 9sts fasten_off next head round 1dc 40ch 1dc x 43 do not change to oddment of white yarn turn psm 86sts & 43ch loops white re-join white in 2nd double_crochet of black round rounds 10 & 11 1dc 40ch 1dc x 39 do not 1ch 2dc in this st 1dc 1htr 3tr in next st 1htr turn psm 78sts & 39ch loops 3dc fasten_off leaving a long tail for stitching to rounds 12 & 13 1dc 40ch 1dc x 35 do not face turn psm 70sts & 35ch loops nose make 1 rounds 14 & 15 1dc 40ch 1dc x 31 do not make either a magic magic_ring or a 3ch slip_stitch turn psm 62sts & 31ch loops into first chain ring work in rounds with rs facing rounds 16 & 17 1dc 40ch 1dc x 27 do not round 1 6dc into ring pull tail tight psm 6sts turn psm 54sts & 27ch loops round 2 1dc 1ch 2dc 1ch 2dc 1ch 1dc rounds 18 & 19 1dc 40ch 1dc x 23 do not msm 9sts turn psm 46sts & 23ch loops round 3 1dc * 1dc 1ch 1dc in chain space rounds 20 & 21 1dc 40ch 1dc x 19 do not 2dc* rept from *to* once more 1dc 1ch 1dc turn psm 38sts & 19ch loops in chain space 1dc msm 15sts rounds 22 & 23 1dc 40ch 1dc x 15 do not round 4 2dc * 1dc 1ch 1dc in chain space turn psm 30sts & 15ch loops 4dc* rept from *to* once more 1dc 1ch 1dc rounds 24 & 25 1dc 40ch 1dc x 11 do not in chain space 2dc msm slip_stitch in top of 1st double_crochet 21sts turn psm 22sts & 11ch loops fasten_off leaving a long tail for stitching to face pre-felting & assembly instructions 1 using the long tail of yarn attached to each piece securely sew both eyes & nose onto head by oversewing round their edges making sure to catch every stitch position on face as seen in photographs a b & c on next page place each eye a few stitches apart and line up the bottom straight edge of each eye along the top of muzzle place nose on front of muzzle lining up one of the corners with the center ring of 8dc workied in first round of crocheting the head trim any long tails left on your crocheted pieces now otherwise they will all tangle & felt together in the washing machine page 6 copyright © 2008 fiona kelly make for yourself but do not sell
